name: bignumber.js
description: A library for arbitrary-precision decimal and non-decimal arithmetic

scripts.build: uglifyjs bignumber.js --source-map bignumber.js.map -c -m -o bignumber.min.js --preamble "/* bignumber.js v2.1.4 https://github.com/MikeMcl/bignumber.js/LICENCE */"
